content: find me some details of adith college

Adith completed his Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (B.Sc) from the College of Applied Science in Mavelikara with a graduation date of May 2023. He then pursued his Master of Computer Application (MCA) from the College of Engineering in Chengunnur Alappuzha, with a graduation date of May 2025. These are the educational details of Adith related to his college studies.
